Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
wxAESBaseThis is the base class for the AES algorithm
wxAESCipherThis is the encryption class for the AES algorithm
wxAESDecipherThis is the decryption class for the AES algorithm
wxSHA160This is the SHA-1 class (it's called wxSHA160 because of the output hash size in bits)
wxSHA160HashThis class represents an SHA 160 bits binary buffer
wxSHA224This is the SHA-224 class (output hash size is 224 bits)
wxSHA224HashThis class represents an SHA 224 bits binary buffer
wxSHA256This is the SHA-256 class (output hash size is 256 bits)
wxSHA256HashThis class represents an SHA 256 bits binary buffer
wxSHA384This is the SHA-384 class (output hash size is 384 bits)
wxSHA384HashThis class represents an SHA 384 bits binary buffer
wxSHA512This is the SHA-512 class (output hash size is 512 bits)
wxSHA512HashThis class represents an SHA 512 bits binary buffer
wxSHABase1024This is the base class for SHA hash function with a 1024 bits working buffer (SHA-384 and SHA-512)
wxSHABase512This is the base class for SHA hash function with a 1024 bits working buffer (SHA-160, SHA-224 and SHA-256)
wxUint128This class represents a 128 bits unsigned integer
